bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The location printed on the W. H. Nickels Receipt is Esteville, Virginia, which has since been renamed Gate City, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a receipt of payment from John A. Mann to W. H. Nickels. The receipt itemizes purchases for paper, salt, and flour, spanning over a one year period from 1832 to July of 1833. The total bill amount is $3.87 and the location printed on the receipt is Esteville, VA.
